programme.title: Built For The Kill
programme.desc: The crocodile is the world's largest reptilian predator, but it takes years of intensive training to learn to be lethal. It enters the world as a replica of its adult form, only four thousand times smaller. Built for the Kill: Crocodile follows the transformation of a tiny hatchling into an accomplished killer, exposing real life-and-death struggles in dramatic second-by-second detail.

programme.title: Built For The Kill
programme.desc: The hyena, much maligned and misunderstood, is no slobbering scavenger. It's a calculating killer: as smart as a primate, as lethal as a lion. Built for the Kill: Hyena follows the transformation of a tiny cub into an accomplished hunter; exposing real life and death struggles in dramatic second-by-second detail. .

programme.title: Wild Central America
programme.desc: Nigel Marven explores the stunningly beautiful country of Guatemala, uncovering a wealth of wildlife, dramatic scenery and ancient Maya history along the way. Join him to see the world's most beautiful lake, Central America's most colourful pitviper and incredible views from the 'top of the Maya world'. There are Quetzals, jays and orchids in the cloud forests and venomous lizards in the arid interior.

programme.title: Wild Central America
programme.desc: Join affable presenter Nigel Marven as he discovers the colourful and varied wildlife of Costa Rica. Meet Scarlet Macaws on the Osa Peninsula, playful Spotted Dolphins in the Gulf of Dulce, a 'Christmas Tree' Eyelash Palm Pitviper, baby Leatherback Turtles on Costa Rica's Caribbean coast and a group of colourful kings in the north of the country.

programme.title: Built For The Kill

It enters the world as a replica of its adult form, only four thousand times smaller. Built for the Kill: Crocodile follows the transformation of a tiny hatchling into an accomplished killer, exposing real life-and-death struggles in dramatic second-by-second detail.

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: When you've got it all, why would you give it all up? We expect animals to take the path of least resistance -- choosing the easiest and surest ways to get food, safety and comfort. But animals aren't always so predictable.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: As top dog in the Flatlands, Furgie is taking his job a little too seriously, challenging a pesky thief even if it upsets his pregnant wife, June..

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: In the Flatlands, Furgie feels obligated to help the pregnant widow that was left behind after his brawl with Brutus. .

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: The Christmas Island red crab is a land bound crab that still has strong ties to the ocean, the only place where they can give birth to their young.

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: Ain't love grand? Well, to many animals in the wild, attracting a mate and getting the chance to breed is more like a blood sport. The mating urge drives animals to make long journeys, to let down their guard in the presence of predators, and even to fight each other to the death.

programme.title: Land Of The Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Spring rains bring new opportunities and hope to the land of the Iberian lynx. But for the female lynxes of the valley, it is always a challenge to raise their cubs. The series follows the lynxes in their struggle for survival, from the thrill of the hunt to the tender moments of parenting, and also witnesses their coexistence with other animals like majestic golden eagles or powerful deer.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: This episode reveals what happens when the Animal Kingdoms most audacious species fight tooth and claw, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed fights from all four corners of the globe. Claws and fangs clash when some of the worlds most awesome animals engage in all-out warfare..

Here, two creatures ‚Äî the sea turtle and the jaguar ‚Äî meet with spectacular consequences for both their species and the very different environments they inhabit, and an unwitting alliance turns the predator into the protector.

programme.title: Cecil: The Legacy of A King
programme.desc: Hwange's lions are rumored to be some of the biggest wild lions on the planet. One magnificent beast was destined to become one of Africa's most famous animals. He was known as Cecil. While his demise at the hand of hunters was splashed across the media, sparking fury in all who heard his tale, Cecil's story before he was posthumously iconized is worthy of celebrating.

programme.title: Land Of The Iberian Lynx

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
